Title: prompt shipping and good price
Pros: the shipping was fast and the price is attractive.

Title: Eggscellent!!
Cons: Everything smells like moth balls.  Well not the camera and gear, just the boxes and packing material.  But it reeks!
Pros: Great starter kit for the price.  New(grey market).  Cannot complain at this price.  It is Nikons best DSLR to date.  Not counting the full frame D600 of course.
Comments: I bought this because I finally decided to make the move to digital.  No complaints.  Everything arrived on time and in order.  The add ons are cheap and flimsy but Im not complaining.  For the price who could.  I suppose if the camera dies after the 30days ill be dealing with how to repair.  Other than that I really will be enjoying this!!

Title: Great deal
Pros:
Greatt deal, Prompt customer service.
Amazing camera and lenses
Comments: Our package had a card reader and tripod which were defective. We received prompt replacement even during hurricane Sandy through UPS as soon we reported that. Thank you
